reviewText:
I grew up watching this movie and so I wanted it for myeslf (especially now that Disney is coming out with their own version of the Snow Queen so it will be harder to find after 2014).

The mailing time was prompt and when I discovered the VHS was faulty (as can happen with VHS's over time, the tape gets warn) I emailed the seller and they sent me a new one, but not before opening it and watching part of it to make sure there were no problems with the film.

I'm more than satisfied with their help and the quality of the working VHS
